Software Freedom Day

== About ==
This page was created to help provide ideas and resources for teams that are interested in participating in SFD.

SFD is a global effort to raise the awareness of the availability and importance of software freedom.

== When ==

September 15, 2007

Software Freedom Day happens on the third Saturday in September each year.

== Participate ==

First, navigate to <nowiki>[[http://www.softwarefreedomday.org/participate|softwarefreedomday.org]]</nowiki> and register your team.

Software Freedom Day events should target the general public.  Setting up a table with demo systems, literature, CD, etc. at a local fair, market, or other high traffic public venue is ideal.
